detail_desc: 3/4-length leggings in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length lace kaftan with a V-neck front and back, buttons down the front and slits in the sides.
Dress in soft, leopard-print cotton jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Batik-patterned swim top with a small stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. The polyester content of the swim top is recycled.
Jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut coat in soft imitation suede with a small stand-up collar and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Patch front pockets, and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length shorts in waffled cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Regular fit.
Dress with a soft jersey top, visible zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on bow and lined, flared skirt in a printed weave with a sheen.
Fine-knit ankle socks with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved tunic in jersey crêpe with a rounded hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in ribbed organic cotton jersey. Square neckline with a broderie anglaise frill trim. Unlined.

Chinos in washed, sturdy cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, a coin pocket at the front and welt back pockets with a button. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shopper in braided paper straw with two wooden handles at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap in imitation leather with a carabiner hook at each end. One zipped inner compartment and a sturdy base in imitation leather. Lined. Depth 14 cm. Height 29 cm. Width 37 cm.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in jersey with a print motif on the front, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads. Elasticated waist and soft inside.

Joggers in sturdy, cotton-blend jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, and a ventilating mesh section at the crotch. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and wide ribbing at the hems.

Shopper in sturdy, perforated imitation leather with round handles and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined with a removable twill inner bag with a drawstring closure. The lining bag can be used separately. Size 14x25x32 cm.
Top woven in a cotton blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and wide, frill-trimmed smocking at the top. Seam at the waist and a flared peplum.
Fully lined, textured swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder, and one narrow, adjustable shoulder strap.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a decorative belt with a metal buckle.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, a coin pocket at the front, back pockets and straight, wide legs.

Fitted workout jumpsuit in fast-drying, functional stretch jersey with a V-neck, lined bust with removable inserts, and a deep V-neck at the back. Wide shoulder straps, a seam under the bust and at the waist and a reinforced gusset.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs with a concealed zip at the hems.
5-pocket joggers in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, a fake fly, low crotch and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

All-in-one suit in soft pile. Hood with ears and a zip down the front that has a chin guard at the top and continues down one leg. Opening mitts at the cuffs that can be folded over to keep the hands warm. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Wide elastic waist belt with a large metal buckle and hook-and-eye fastening. Width 5.5 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Loose-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and a racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in a cotton blend. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and ears at the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in thermal fleece made partly from recycled polyester. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, a decorative tie detail at the front, spaghetti shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.

Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a round neck with an opening at the front and ties at the top. Small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, and smocking with a flounce at the cuffs and hem.
Longer cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.
Cardigan knitted in a wool blend with low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow ribbing at the cuffs. No buttons.
Straight-style, double-breasted coat in a wool blend with a brushed finish. Notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and large patch front pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a decorative scalloped trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and short puff sleeves with a decorative scalloped trim.

Crocheted top in a soft cotton blend with a stand-up collar and double-layered flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Cut-out section at the back with buttons at the bottom and back of the neck. Seam at the hem with a peplum.

Boxy jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. High collar with a drawstring, zip down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Lined.
Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with smocking over the bust, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Sandals with braided jute trims around the soles and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jumper in a soft, cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded tongue and edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, long puff sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Concealed zip at one side, a seam at the waist with pleats and a flared skirt. Lined.
Set with a solid colour bow tie and a patterned handkerchief in satin. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11.5 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in washed, organic cotton denim with buttons at the sides and straps with adjustable fasteners at the front. Two front pockets, a back pocket and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).

Knee-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, tie at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Seam and drawstring at the waist and a skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Playsuit in a patterned weave with narrow shoulder straps and elastication around the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a long, sewn-on cape with an asymmetric hem.
Stud earrings in various designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.8 cm.
Bikini top with removable inserts and ties at the back of the neck and back.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Bucket bag in braided paper straw with a shoulder strap, drawstring at the top and zipped inner compartment. Lined. Diameter approx 17 cm, width 21 cm, height 22 cm.

Straight-cut dress in a cotton poplin weave with a round neckline and flounce-trimmed, V-shaped seam at the top. Opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim. Unlined.

Checked shirt in soft cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable fasteners, a yoke with a box pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut jacket in pile with a large, rounded collar and zip with a round tab. Patch front pockets, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and cuffs with press-studs. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a polo neck. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in patterned organic cotton slub jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder, a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short shorts in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Patch front pockets, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long earrings in plastic and metal. Length 9 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a round neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
